org.hibernate.search.engine.service.spi

Interface Service

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BeanResolver, ClassLoaderService, DirectoryProviderService<D>, ElasticsearchAnalyzerDefinitionTranslator, ElasticsearchClientFactory, ElasticsearchDialectFactory, ElasticsearchService, HibernateSessionFactoryService, IdUniquenessResolver, IndexManagerFactory, LockFactoryCreator, LuceneAnalysisDefinitionSourceService, LuceneQueryTranslator, LuceneWorkSerializer, MessageSenderService, NamedResolver, NestingContextFactoryProvider, NodeSelectorService, SerializationProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvroSerializationProvider, BaseDirectoryProviderService, DefaultClassLoaderService, DefaultDirectoryProviderService, DefaultElasticsearchAnalyzerDefinitionTranslator, DefaultElasticsearchClientFactory, DefaultElasticsearchDialectFactory, DefaultElasticsearchService, DefaultHibernateSessionFactoryService, DefaultIdUniquenessResolver, DefaultIndexManagerFactory, DefaultLockFactoryCreator, DefaultNodeSelectorService, DelegatingClassLoaderService, DispatchMessageSender, ElasticsearchLuceneQueryTranslator, ElasticsearchNestingContextFactoryProvider, HibernateCoreIdUniquenessResolver, LuceneWorkSerializerImpl, NoopNamedResolver, PropertiesBasedLuceneAnalysisDefinitionSourceService, ReflectionBeanResolver, ReflectionFallbackBeanResolver

    public interface Service
    Marker interface for services.
    Author:
    Hardy Ferentschik
